FILE: cm630770v11.0.txt
DYAD: IRAN - PAKISTAN
RIVALRY: RIV1204
DISPUTE(S): MID2791 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190429
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190429

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2791

TERRMID: MID2791 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2791 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2791 from Gibler 2018, in 1987 Iran attacked a Pakistani oil tanker. Iran routinely attacked ships from countries trading with Iraq during the Iran-Iraq War to harm Iraq's economy. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial dispute. 

MARITMID: MID2791 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2791 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2791 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2791 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2791 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2791 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2791 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4597

TERRMID: MID4597 3 -- not territory
TERRMID-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4597 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4597 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4597 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4597 1 -- civil war MID
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID4597 from Gibler 2018, in 2009 a Pakistani suicide bomber attacked an Iranian town. Iran fortified its border with Pakistan in response. From NYT 10/19/2009, the attack was by insurgents from a Baluchi, Sunni rebel group, Jundullah. Coded civil war MID because this was connected to militarized rebels in Pakistan, who were targeting Iran. 

CIVWARLINK: MID4597 3 -- not civil war link
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4597 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4597 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4597 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID4 2002-2010:

MID4597
rivalry=630770 nationa=IRAN nationb=PAKISTAN MID4597 20091023-20091023 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Iran moved troops to its border with Pakistan following a suicide attack on the Iranian army. First day of dispute was on 10/23/2009 and last day of dispute was on 10/23/2009.

RIVNOTES:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 

Slackman, Michael. Twin Bombings Kill 5 Commanders of Revolutionary Guards Corps in Iran. New York Times 10/19/2009. A4.
